identity.name: SATYA-VERIFY
identity.vibe: Journalistic Authority meets Silicon Valley Precision

typography.h1: font-serif font-black tracking-tight text-5xl md:text-7xl leading-[0.9]
typography.h3: font-sans font-semibold tracking-normal text-xl md:text-2xl uppercase
typography.body: font-sans text-base md:text-lg leading-relaxed text-slate-700 dark:text-slate-300
typography.caption: font-mono text-xs tracking-wider uppercase text-slate-500

buttons.primary: bg-blue-900 text-white hover:bg-blue-800 rounded-none px-8 py-3 font-bold tracking-wide shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-blue-900 border-2 border-blue-900 hover:bg-blue-50 rounded-none px-8 py-3 font-bold tracking-wide transition-all

cards.news_item: group relative bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border-b border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 p-6 hover:bg-slate-50 dark:hover:bg-slate-800/50 transition-colors

inputs.search: w-full bg-white dark:bg-slate-950 border-2 border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 focus:border-blue-900 dark:focus:border-blue-500 rounded-lg px-6 py-4 text-lg shadow-sm transition-all placeholder:text-slate-400

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Merriweather' font for all Headings to give a journalistic feel.
Implement the 'Verdict Stamp' animation using Framer Motion when a result is displayed.
The 'TRUE' verdict should be Emerald Green, 'FALSE' should be Rose Red, 'MISLEADING' should be Orange.
Use the 'Noise' texture overlay on the main background to avoid a flat digital look.
For the Input Form, make it look like a 'Search Engine' but with more depth (shadows).
Ensure the 'History' page uses a dense table layout for efficiency.
Use the provided image URLs for the Hero section and Feature cards.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds; use solid colors or subtle textures.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' aesthetics; aim for a bespoke, editorial look.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
